reviewText: Awesome prep for anyone considering running an Enduro team.  While they may seem amateur, their approach is similar to many big money teams.  Having been to the 25 at Thunderhill as a crew member in previous years (including the year this was filmed), it's a huge undertaking.  We are putting together a team for 2015, and Double Down has been a great inspiration as well a road map to success.. More or less.
fun to see what they had to go through.

I loved it! you feel like you're there. Lots of great footage - behind the scenes, inside the cars and on the tracks.
You get to see what it takes to complete an endurance race, and how big a feat it is to win a spot on the podium.
***** 5 stars!
